metadata.Title: CVE-2021-21640 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Jenkins 2.286 and earlier, LTS 2.277.1 and earlier does not properly check that a newly created view has an allowed name, allowing attackers with View/Create permission to create views with invalid or already-used names.

criterions.comment: jenkins: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
